translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽(The method of exposition in the Paṭṭhāna is as follows:)🔽(1) The method of exposition in forward order (anuloma-paṭṭhāna)🔽(2) The method of exposition in reverse order (paccanīya-paṭṭhāna)🔽(3) The method of exposition in pairs (duka-paṭṭhāna)

analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sa nidassana ttika citta sampayutta duka
translated: (4) The method of exposition in triplets (tika-paṭṭhāna)🔽(5) The method of exposition in the method of exposition in pairs and triplets (duka-tika-paṭṭhāna)🔽(6) The method of exposition in the method of exposition in triplets and pairs (tika-duka-paṭṭhāna)

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nacittasampayutto
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ
translated: (7) The method of exposition in the method of exposition in pairs and pairs (duka-duka-paṭṭhāna)

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽nasanidassanasappaṭigho nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca  na sa nidassana sa ppaṭighaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe a nidassana appaṭigha
translated: (8) The method of exposition in the method of exposition in triplets and triplets (tika-tika-paṭṭhāna)🔽(9) The method of exposition in the method of exposition in pairs and triplets and in the method of exposition in triplets and pairs (duka-tika-tika-duka-paṭṭhāna)

original: cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nacittasampayutto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho🔽nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ ca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ  na citta sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: (10) The method of exposition in the method of exposition in triplets and triplets and in the method of exposition in pairs and pairs (tika-duka-duka-tika-paṭṭhāna)🔽(11) The method of exposition in the method of exposition in pairs and triplets and in the method of exposition in triplets and pairs (duka-tika-tika-duka-paṭṭhāna)🔽(12) The method of exposition in the method of exposition in triplets and triplets and in the method of exposition in pairs and pairs (tika-duka-duka-tika-paṭṭhāna)

original: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe avigate cha
translated: (13) The method of exposition in the method of exposition in pairs and pairs and in the method of exposition in triplets and triplets (duka-duka-tika-tika-paṭṭhāna)🔽(14) The method of exposition in the method of exposition in pairs and triplets and in the method of exposition in pairs and pairs (duka-duka-duka-tika-paṭṭhāna)🔽(15) The method of exposition in the method of exposition in triplets and triplets
